edu.cmu.iot

Class IoTConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.iot.IoTConnection

  • public class IoTConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A connection to an IoT-enabled house. This class handles the network connection to the house Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: 2015 Jeffrey S. Gennari Versions: 1.0 November 2015 - initial version
